gurmukhi: pUr pry Bey cUir ispwhI ]s√çwim ky kwj kI lwj inbwhI ]
transliteration: Poor Dare Bhae Choor(i) Sipaahee|| Svaami Ke Kaaj Kilaaj Nibaahee||
translation: The fighting soldiers, having been cut into bits, fell down, but none of them put to disrepute the dignity of their master.

gurmukhi: bwih kiRpwxn bwx su bIrM ]AMq Bjy BX mwn ADIrM ]27]
transliteration: Baah(i) Kridaanan Baan Su Bderan|| Ant Bhaje Bhay Maan Adhderan||27||
translation: Showing the blows of the swords and arrows, the warriors fled away ultimately in great fear.27.

gurmukhi: qXwg cly rx kO sB bIrw ]lwj ibsir geI Bey ADIrw ]
transliteration: Tyaag Chale Ran Kau Sabh Beeraa|| Laaj Bisar(i) Gadbhae Adheeraa||
translation: All the warriors, abandoning their shyness and getting impatient left the battlefield and ran away.

gurmukhi: ihrnwCs qb Awp irswnw ]bwNiD clXo rx ko kr gwnw ]28]
transliteration: Hirnaachhas Tab Aap Risaanaa|| Baandh(i) Chadyo Ran Ko Kar Gadnaa||28||
translation: Seeing this, Hirnayakashipu himself in great ire, moved forward for waging war.28.

gurmukhi: BrXo ros nrisMG srUpM ]Awvq dyK smuih rx BUpM ]
transliteration: Bdaryo Ros Narsingh Daroopan|| Aavat Dekh Samuh(i) Ran Bhoopan||
translation: Seeing the Emperor coming towards him, Narsingh also got infuriated.

gurmukhi: inj Gwvn ko ros nw mwnw ]inrK syvkih duKI rswnw ]29]
transliteration: Nij Ghaavan Ko Ros Naa Maanaa|| Nirakh Sevakah(i) Doukhirasaanaa||29||
translation: He did not care for his wounds, because he was in extreme agony of seeing the suffering on his devotees.29.

gurmukhi: kMpweIstw isMG grjXo krUrM ]aufXo hyir bIrwn ky muK nUrM ]
transliteration: Kanpaaeestaa Singh Gadjyo Darooran|| Udyo Her(i) Beeraan Ke Moukh Nooran||
translation: Giving a jeck to his neck, Narsingh raised a terrible thunder and listening to his thunder, the faces of the heroes turned pale.

gurmukhi: auTXo nwid bMky CuhI gYx r`jM ]hsy dyv srbM Bey dYq l`jM ]30]
transliteration: Outhyo Naadh Banke Chhuhigadn Rajjan|| Hase Dev Saraban Bhae Dait Laggadg||30||
translation: Because of that dreadful sound, the earth trembled and its dust touched the sky. All the gods began to smile and the heads of the demons bowed down with shame.30.

gurmukhi: mcXo duMd ju`DM mcy duie juAwxM ]qV`kwr qygM kV`ky kmwxM ]
transliteration: Machyo Dound Juddhan Mache Due Juaanan|| Tadakkaar Tegadg Kadakke Kamaanan||
translation: The dreadful war of both the heroic fighters got ablazed, and the clattering sound of the sword and the cracking sound of the bows was heard.

gurmukhi: iBirXo kop kY dwnvM sulqwxM ]hVM sRon cly mDM mulqwxM ]31]
transliteration: Bhiriyo Ko Kai Daanavan Sultaanan|| Hadan Sron Chale Madhan Multaanan||31||
translation: The demon-king fought in great fury and there was a flood of blood in the battlefield.31.
